price: ដោយពួកគេសម្លឹងមើលទៅលើអ្វីដែលពួកគេកំពុងប្រព្រឹត្ដ ទៅលើបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលមានជំនឿ។
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
